General.Name: M & A EQUITY HOLDINGS BERHAD
General.Description: M & A Equity Holdings Berhad engages in the manufacture and trading of rubber wood furniture and component parts in Malaysia and internationally. It offers processed materials primarily in the form of rubberwood laminated boards, moulded timber, finger joints, and furniture components. The company is also involved in the property development with focus on the Klang Valley. The company was formerly known as SYF Resources Berhad and changed its name to M & A Equity Holdings Berhad in June 2023. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Semenyih, Malaysia.
